```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Install packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl) # for importing excel files
```

# Import data

```{r}
# csv file
data <- read.csv("data/Salaries.csv")
data

# excel file
data <- read_excel("data/Salaries.xlsx")
data
```

# Plot stock prices

```{r}
data %>%
    
    ggplot(aes(rank)) +
    geom_bar()
```
